name: Bolinas Museum
description: Premier fine arts museum in Marin County, dedicated to collecting, preserving and exhibiting the art and history of coastal Marin. Free admission.
fullDescription: Premier fine arts museum in Marin County, dedicated to collecting, preserving and exhibiting the art and history of coastal Marin. Free admission.
keywords: Bolinas Museum, Marin County, free museum, art, history, coastal Marin, fine arts, exhibitions
